entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -35.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 2:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -35.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -38.9°C
Wind: W 32 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
